content.question: Which of the following code segments can replace /* missing code */ so that the getCategory method works as intended?

choices.label: if (year > 1600 || year < 400) { category = "Other"; } else if (year >= 1400) { category = "Renaissance"; } else if (year >= 400) { category = "Medieval"; }
if (year > 1600 || year < 400) { category = "Other"; } if (year >= 1400) { category = "Renaissance"; } if (year >= 400) { category = "Medieval"; }
if (year >= 1400) { category = "Renaissance"; } else if (year >= 400) { category = "Medieval"; } else { category = "Other"; }
if (year >= 1400) { category = "Renaissance"; } if (year >= 400) { category = "Medieval"; } else { category = "Other"; }

content.answer: if (year > 1600 || year < 400) { category = "Other"; } else if (year >= 1400) { category = "Renaissance"; } else if (year >= 400) { category = "Medieval"; }
